scripts:
set ACL for "CMTY Support {DEV}","CMTY Author {DEV}","CMTY Services Author {DEV}","CMTY Education Author {DEV}"
 allow jcr:versionManagement, jcr:modifyProperties, jcr:addChildNodes, jcr:lockManagement, jcr:nodeTypeManagement on /content/workday-community/en-us/events
 allow jcr:removeChildNodes, jcr:removeNode, jcr:addChildNodes, jcr:nodeTypeManagement on /content/workday-community/en-us/events restriction(rep:glob,*/jcr:content*)
end

set ACL for "CMTY Support {DEV}","CMTY Author {DEV}","CMTY Services Author {DEV}","CMTY Education Author {DEV}"

end

end

set ACL for "CMTY CC Admin {DEV}"
 allow jcr:versionManagement, jcr:read, crx:replicate, rep:write, jcr:lockManagement on /content/workday-community
 allow jcr:removeChildNodes, jcr:removeNode, jcr:read, jcr:addChildNodes, jcr:nodeTypeManagement on /content/workday-community restriction(rep:glob,*/jcr:content*)
end
